projects.title: A&M Camps Website
projects.tagline: Full-Stack Development Project in Ruby on Rails
projects.desc: Simulated consultancy with "A&M Chess Camps" to develop database and frontend website to meet accessibility, clarity, and interactivity standards. Created with Ruby, HTML, and JS using the Materialize CSS framework. Website development project for 67-272 Application Design and Development. Code withheld at request of course instructor.
